testcase.name: sign up a new user on gootickets.com
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the sign up page...........................................passed And user selects the gender.................................................passed Then user enters firstname and lastname as "Andrew" and "Ryan"..............passed And user provides email as "aryan@gmail.com"................................passed When user enters the password as "aryan@123"................................passed And user confirms the new password as "aryan@123"...........................passed Then user clicks on general terms and conditions radio button...............passed And user clicks on create your account button and sees the message as "Welcome to your account dashboard".passed
